name: Verify hero headline and feature text are displayed -- @1.2
fullName: Homepage marketing content and layout: Verify hero headline and feature text are displayed

steps.name: Given the user navigates to the Home page
Then the hero heading text should equal "BESPOKE SOFTWARE. UNRIVALLED ADVANTAGE."

And the intro feature text at position 2 should equal "With bespoke systems and Agentic AI, we eliminate the drain of legacy debt and unify your data, building bespoke solutions that seamlessly embed intelligence – anticipating needs, automating decisions, and driving immediate commercial impact."

parameters.name: paragraph_text
parameters.value: With bespoke systems and Agentic AI, we eliminate the drain of legacy debt and unify your data, building bespoke solutions that seamlessly embed intelligence – anticipating needs, automating decisions, and driving immediate commercial impact.

parameterValues: With bespoke systems and Agentic AI, we eliminate the drain of legacy debt and unify your data, building bespoke solutions that seamlessly embed intelligence – anticipating needs, automating decisions, and driving immediate commercial impact.
